Qingyang Zhang/张庆阳

I'm a first-year PhD student at Tianjin University in China advised by Professor Changqing Zhang. I'm now also an intern at Tencent AI Lab co-advised by Yatao Bian.

I received my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Technology from Tianjin University (2018-2022). After that, I pursued my Master's in the School of Computer Science and Technology at Tianjin University and transitioned into a Ph.D. candidate through the direct doctoral program in 2024.

Email  /  Google Scholar  /  Github

News

[2023-05] One paper accepted by NeurIPS, thanks to all co-authors!

[2024-05] We release a survey about fusion of low-quality multi-modal data! [arXiv]

[2024-02] Starting my internship at Tencent AI Lab, superivsed by Yatao Bian.

[2023-4] Two paper accepted by ICML including one Oral paper, thanks to all co-authors.

[2022-06] Graduate from Tianjin University.

Services

Survey
Multimodal Fusion on Low-quality Data: A Comprehensive Survey

Qingyang Zhang, Yake Wei, Zongbo Han, Huazhu Fu, Xi Peng, Cheng Deng, Qinghua Hu, Cai Xu, Jie Wen, Di Hu, Changqing Zhang


arXiv / awesome list

Qingyang Zhang, Qiuxuan Feng, Joey Tianyi Zhou, Yatao Bian, Qinghua Hu and Changqing Zhang

arXiv / code

Solve conflicts between OOD detection and generalization for dual-optimal performance.
